Description: Epiphone Les Paul Custom Prophecy Plus Electric Guitar +Hard Shell Epiphone Case Item Condition: Epiphone Les Paul Custom Prophecy Plus was purchased from a collector that does not play guitar so the guitar is unplayed and in mint condition. This Les Paul does come with a Epiphone hard shell case and all the case candy. The Prophecy Les Paul is a bold update of the classic Les Paul design. Black hardware adds to the Prophecy's dark disposition and the metal barrel knobs are topped with mother-of-pearl caps to match the finish of your choice. The mother-of-pearl and abalone block and triangle fret inlays and "stickpin" headstock inlay add a touch of flash, along with the white binding surrounding the body, neck, and headstock. And if you're worried about rocking too hard, fear not -- the straplocks will ensure your guitar stays put. Equipped with an EMG 81 humbucker in the bridge position and an EMG 85 humbucker in the neck, the Prophecy Les Paul can deliver heavy sounds to match its look. These pickups are known to aptly handle high-volume and high-gain sounds, making them a favorite among metal players. If your sound leans toward the lighter end of the spectrum, the active circuit also makes for clear, resonant clean tones. Features: - Mahogany body - Quilted maple top - EMG 81 (bridge) and EMG 85 (neck) active humbucker pickups - Speed-taper D-profile neck - 24 jumbo frets - Rosewood fingerboard - LockTone Tune-O-Matic bridge - LockTone stopbar tailpiece - Straplocks to keep your axe in place - Hardshell case included Questions?
